extension_setup.title: üîß Browser Extension Setup
content: Step 1: Install the Video Downloader Pro extension from Chrome Web Store
Step 2: Make sure the main application is running in the background
Step 3: Navigate to any video site (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, etc.)
Step 4: Click the extension icon next to any video to download it
Step 5: The download window will automatically appear in Video Downloader Pro
‚Ä¢ Make sure port 8799 is not blocked by firewall
‚Ä¢ Restart the application if extension doesn't connect
‚Ä¢ Check if background service is running in Settings tab

content: Watch our step-by-step video tutorials to master Video Downloader Pro:

2. Browser Extension Setup - Install and use the browser extension
3. Advanced Features - Batch downloads, quality settings, and more

Click any tutorial below to start watching:

app_features.title: ‚ú® Premium Features
content: ‚úÖ Audio Downloads: MP3, M4A, AAC, WAV, Opus, FLAC
‚úÖ 1000+ supported sites (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, etc.)
‚úÖ Premium user interface with dark theme

updates_info.title: üîÑ Updates & Maintenance
content: Auto-updates: Video Downloader Pro automatically checks for updates on startup
Manual Updates: Go to Settings ‚Üí Check for Updates to manually update
Dependency Updates: The app automatically manages yt-dlp, ffmpeg, and aria2
‚Ä¢ Keep the app updated for bug fixes and new features
‚Ä¢ Regularly check dependencies in Settings ‚Üí Dependency Management
‚Ä¢ Clear recent downloads list periodically for better performance
‚Ä¢ Keep your antivirus whitelisted for the app directory
‚Ä¢ Backup your license key and settings regularly

faqs.question: Why is my download slow?
faqs.answer: Check your internet connection. You can also try using aria2c in Settings for faster downloads. Make sure you're not downloading multiple videos simultaneously.

faqs.question: Audio and video are not merging?
faqs.answer: Make sure ffmpeg is installed. Go to Settings ‚Üí Dependency Management and install missing dependencies. The app needs ffmpeg to merge audio and video streams.

faqs.question: Extension is not working?
faqs.answer: Check if background service is running in Settings. Restart the service if needed. Make sure the app is running before using the extension.

faqs.question: Can I download from all video sites?
faqs.answer: Yes! Video Downloader Pro supports 1000+ sites including YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Vimeo, Dailymotion, and many more.

faqs.question: How to upgrade to Premium?
faqs.answer: Click the 'Upgrade to Pro' button in the Download tab or go to Settings ‚Üí License Activation. You can purchase a license from our website.

faqs.question: Why is video downloading without audio?
faqs.answer: Make sure ffmpeg is installed. The app uses ffmpeg to merge audio and video streams. Go to Settings ‚Üí Dependency Management and install ffmpeg.

faqs.question: How to resume failed downloads?
faqs.answer: Failed downloads can be resumed by clicking the download button again. The app uses yt-dlp's continue feature to resume from where it left off.

faqs.question: What are iTags?
faqs.answer: iTags are YouTube's internal format codes. Higher numbers generally mean better quality. The browser extension automatically selects the best iTag for your chosen quality.

faqs.question: Can I download private videos?
faqs.answer: No, Video Downloader Pro can only download publicly available videos that you have access to view.

faqs.question: Is this software free?
faqs.answer: The basic version offers limited downloads. You can upgrade to Premium for unlimited downloads and all features.
